name: Fallen Cherub
description: While Elysium Perdita was unguarded Bacchus overtook the manor and his fallen cherub lost the flower of paradise. Animated from the still life by Jan Den Uyl c. 1595 and two paintings by Caravaggio - poetry taken from Charles Baudelaire’s ‘Flowers Of Evil’ and John Milton’s ‘Paradise Lost’ - Produced and performed by Laurence Fuller @laurencefuller
